channel.title: Problem with my Delay/actionTimer... Won't let me click an object twice?

item.title: Problem with my Delay/actionTimer... Won't let me click an object twice?
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

Well… when i try using a delay timer it doesn’t let me click an object more than once. After i click it the first time i can’t click it again with it doing the action or giving me the item and what not… Any ideas?

} if(objectID == 299) { if(delay == 0) { addItem(995, 50000); delay = 1; sM("You get 50k Coins! Gratz ;)!"); } }

And i also added this to my case’s just to see if it would work:

case 299: if(delay == 0) { addItem(995, 25000); delay = 1; break; }

I want it to be used on Hay Bales… the object ID on hay bales is 299

Read full topic
item.source: Problem with my Delay/actionTimer... Won't let me click an object twice?
